articles.title: Crashed planes lacked safety upgrades because Boeing charged extra
articles.description: The two Boeing 737 Max 8 planes that crashed reportedly lacked important safety upgrades because Boeing charged extra for them. NBC’s Tom Costello joins Stephanie Ruhle and Ali Velshi to discuss how that is allowed and whether passengers should ever get on th…
